section.title: Contributing code to the InterMine project
section.para: We warmly welcome contributions to the project, however big or small. If you would like to get involved, the best thing to do is talk to existing developers via the flymine-dev mailing list, to prevent unnecessary duplication of work.

We prefer to accept patches against the current CVS repository. All code must adhere to the InterMine coding standards (note specifically that every method of every class must have comprehensive unit tests), and not cause any existing unit tests to fail.
